intro-mindy.content: Come play ball with me across our Solar System!
As we play Moonball, we're going to see how different the gravity is...
...across planets and moons in our Solar System!
Gravity is the force that pulls us back down, when we jump up!
So a ball you throw might take longer to fall OR will fall quickly...
...depending on how strong the gravity is on the planet.
It might get a little tricky, but it sure will be fun!

fail-blocker-second-part.content: Try aiming at a different part of the blocker.

fail-second.content: Try aiming the ball a different way!

force-2-alt.content: Try using LESS force to throw the ball.

fail-ball-third-higher.content: Try aiming the ball a little higher.

fail-blocker-second.content: Try aiming for a different blocker.

fail-tramp-second.content: Try rotating the trampoline a different way.

fail-ball-third-lower.content: Try aiming the ball a little lower.

fail-first.content: Hmmm... is there something else we can try?

fail-tramp-third.content: Try turning THAT trampoline THIS way!

force-1.content: Was that the right amount of force?

force-3-alt.content: Try using MORE force to throw the ball.

force-3.content: Try throwing the ball with more force.

force-4.content: I wonder if throwing with MORE force would do it?

force-5.content: I wonder if throwing with LESS force would do it?

force-hint-harder.content: Maybe we should throw the all a bit harder? Let's see what happens!

force-hint-softer.content: Maybe we should throw a bit softer? Let's see what happens!

force-intro-safety.content: To change the force of my throw, use one of these buttons below!

force-intro.content: Hmmm... we need less FORCE to get the ball into the net.
By using less force the ball won't travel as far.
First use THIS tool to change the force.

force-less.content: Try throwing the ball with less force.

force-moonl1.content: First, use THIS tool (below) to change the force.

gravity-earth.content: Earth's a big planet. That means the gravity is pretty strong.
So when you throw the ball into the air, it falls down pretty quick!

gravity-enceladus-alt.content: Here on Encaledus, if you throw a ball in the air...
...it would take it about a minute before it falls back down.

gravity-enceladus.content: The gravity on Enceladus is super weak.
So weak, it would take about a minute to jump up and come down again!
That ball would stay in the air for a loooooong time!

gravity-fact-1.content: Gravity is a force that pulls two objects towards each other!

gravity-fact-2.content: Gravity is why a ball will fall DOWN, rather than up!

gravity-fact-earth-strong.content: The Earth is BIG, and has strong gravity!
So it pulls the ball down quickly.

gravity-jump-earth.content: If you jump on our earth...
it will take about a second to come back down.

gravity-jump-enceladus.content: If you jumped on Saturn's moon Enceladus...
Your jump would take a whole minute!

gravity-jump-jupiter.content: Here on Jupiter, the gravity is SO strong...
...it would be pretty hard to jump at all!

gravity-jump-mars.content: ...it would take a couple of seconds to come down!

gravity-jump-moon.content: If you jumped on the moon...
...it would take several seconds to come down.

gravity-jupiter.content: Jupiter's HUGE! So its gravity is super strong!
When you throw a ball into the air, it doesn’t go high up and it falls down super quick!

gravity-mars-alt.content: On Mars, gravity is less than Earth's.
When you throw a ball into the air, it will fall a little slower than on earth.

gravity-mars-alt2.content: On Mars, gravity is weaker than Earth's.
When you throw a ball into the air, it will fall a little slower than on Earth.

gravity-mars-alt3.content: Mars has more gravity than the moon, but less than Earth.

gravity-mars.content: Mars' gravity is weaker than Earth's Gravity.

gravity-moon.content: Earth’s moon has weak gravity, much less than Earth!
Weak gravity means when something falls, it falls really slowly!

gravity-strong-1.content: Strong gravity makes the ball fall down fast.

gravity-strong-2.content: Wow! This is pretty strong gravity!

gravity-strong-3.content: Whoa! This gravity sure is strong!

gravity-strong-4.content: Now this is what I call strong gravity!

gravity-weak-1.content: Weak gravity allows the ball to stay up longer before it falls!

gravity-weak-2.content: Wow! This is pretty weak gravity!

gravity-weak-4.content: ...and playing ball here is SUPER FUN!

gravity-weak-moon.content: The gravity is much lower here.

intro-hi-03.content: Come play Moonball with me across our SOLAR SYSTEM!

intro-hi-04.content: As we play Moonball, we're going to see how different the gravity is
across planets and moons across our Solar System.

intro-hi-05.content: Gravity is the force that pulls us back down when we jump up!

intro-hi-06.content: So a ball you throw might take longer to fall, or will fall quickly.

intro-hi-07.content: Depending on how strong the gravity is on the planet.

intro-hi-08.content: It might get a little tricky, but it sure will be fun!

intro-hi.content: Come play Moonball with me across our SOLAR SYSTEM!

intro-play.content: Select the play button to begin!

intro-start-2.content: We're going to see how different the gravity is
across planets and moons in our Solar System.

intro-start-3.content: Gravity is the force that pulls us back down when we jump up!

intro-start-4.content: So a ball you throw might take longer to fall
Or fall quickly... depending on how strong the gravity is on the planet.

intro-start-5.content: It might get a little tricky, but it sure will be fun!

menu-letsgo-earth.content: Select this button to start the game!

next-01.content: Let's try playing ball on the moon next.

next-02.content: Great work! Let's try playing ball on Mars next.

next-03.content: Let's try playing ball on Mars next!

next-04.content: Let's try playing ball on Enceladus next!

next-05.content: You are SO GOOD at this.
Let's try playing ball on Jupiter next!

play-aim.content: Aim the ball at the net.

play-ball-tap.content: Tap on the ball to throw it.

play-blocker-2-single.content: Maybe we can use the trampoline AND the blocker...
...to help us bounce the ball into the net.

play-blocker-2.content: Maybe we can use the trampoline and these blockers...
...to help us bounce the ball into the net.

play-blocker-3.content: Let's take it one step at a time.

play-blocker-4.content: First, let's get the ball to bounce on the trampoline!

play-blocker-5.content: Next, let's rotate the trampoline so the ball hits THIS blocker.

play-blocker-6.content: Now, help the ball get over THIS blocker, and into the net!

play-blocker-multiple.content: Uh oh! Here's some blockers between the ball and the net!

play-blocker-single.content: Uh oh! Here's a blocker inbetween the ball and the net!

play-button-tap-alt.content: To throw the ball, tap on THIS button.

play-button-tap.content: Tap on this button to throw the ball.

play-cantreach-tramp.content: We can't throw the ball far enough to reach this goal.
Let's use this trampoline! It will help us bounce the ball into the net!

play-fail-2.content: Keep trying! I know you can do it.

play-fail.content: Hmm... let's look at this a different way.

play-instrux-1.content: Remember, as we go, gravity is what pulls everything down.
Select the EARTH button to get started.

play-instrux-2.content: Select THIS button to get started.

play-instrux-hint-alt.content: Need a hand? Press the hint button!

play-instrux-hint.content: If you need help, press this hint button!

play-mindy-1.content: Now, aim the ball at the net.

play-mindy-tap-el1.content: Aim the ball at the net.
When you're ready, tap on me to throw the ball!

play-mindy-tap-to-2.content: Go on! Tap on me to throw the ball!

play-mindy-tap-to.content: Tap on me to shoot the ball!

play-mindy-tap.content: When you're ready, tap on me to throw the ball!

play-netmove-1-alt2.content: The basketball hoop has moved further away!

play-netmove-1.content: The basketball hoop has moved even further away!

play-netmove-2.content: To ge the ball into this hoop, you'll need to aim the ball a different way.

play-retry.content: Tap on this button to try again!

play-success-2-alt.content: You did it! You're a space travelling superstar!

play-success-2.content: You did it! You completed all the missions!

play-success-alt.content: Fantastic! You turned the trampoline just right...
...to bounce the ball into the net.

play-success-first-alt.content: You did it! You shot the ball into the hoop!

play-success-first.content: You did it! You got the ball in the hoop!

play-success-tramp.content: Fantastic! You turned the trampoline just right...
..to bounce the ball into the net!

play-success.content: You turned the trampoline juuust right to bounce the ball into the net!

play-trajectory-alt.content: Use the white arrow to point the ball towards the net!
Try moving it to different positions to change your throw.

play-trajectory-short.content: To point the ball towards the net, use the white arrow.

play-trajectory.content: To point the ball towards the net, use the white arrow.
Try changing it to different positions to change your throw!

play-tramp-aim-intro-01.content: We can't throw the ball far enough to throw this ball.

play-tramp-aim-intro-02.content: We'll need to rotate this trampoline...
...to help aim the ball into the net.

play-tramp-aim-intro-alt.content: This trampoline needs to be rotated...
...if we're going to get the ball into this net.

play-tramp-aim-intro.content: We can't throw the ball enough to throw this ball.
We'll need to rotate this trampoline to help throw the ball into the net!

play-tramp-aim-to-alt.content: Turn the trampoline to help bounce the ball into the net!

play-tramp-aim-to.content: To turn the trampoline, use it's white arrow!

play-tramp-aim.content: Aim the ball to hit the trampoline!

random-1.content: This must be that gravity thing!

random-10.content: Did I mention that space is soooo cool?

random-13.content: Sunspot is retrieving the ball before it goes too far.

random-14.content: Click on Mindy to shoot the ball!

random-15.content: The basketball hoop has moved even further away!

random-18.content: I don't know what the gravity is on Bortron-7... let's find out.

random-2.content: It's just like I dreamed it would be!

random-4.content: Wow! We're really not on Earth anymore!

random-5-strong.content: Wow! This strong gravity sure makes it hard to throw the ball!

random-5-weak.content: Wow! This weak gravity sure makes it fun to throw the ball!

random-6.content: A kid's place is exploring space!

random-7.content: A kid's space is...playing ball in space!

random-8.content: Wow! You're a pro! Who knew!

random-9.content: Whoa! You're so good at that!

stars-1.content: Collect the stars for some extra fun!

stars-2.content: Collect all three stars to be a superstar!

stars-4.content: You kept trying and got TWO stars!

stars-8.content: Need a hand? The yellow stars will help guide you!

success-1.content: That was challenging... but you did it!

success-2.content: You found new ways to do it!

success-4.content: You kept trying... and it worked!

success-5.content: You are a gravity all star!

success-6.content: You really get the force of gravity!

wonder-01.content: Hmmm... I wonder what the gravity is like on the moon?
It's a lot smaller than the Earth!

wonder-02.content: Hmm... I wonder what the gravity is like on Mars?
It's a bit heavier than the Earth.

wonder-03.content: I wonder what the gravity is like on Enceladus?
It's so much smaller than the Earth!

wonder-04.content: Hmm... I wonder what the gravity is like on Jupiter?
It's a lot heavier than the Earth!

wonder-05.content: I wonder what the gravity is like on Bortron-7?
